constructor.details: function is called every time someone wants to register a new marriage certificate

params._location: =  holds JSON string with location details*
params._spouse1: =  holds JSON string with first spouse details
params._spouse2: =  holds JSON string with second spouse details
params.spouse2address: = keeps second spouse address for validation purposes

returnBalances().details: only the two spouses have access to this function

approveWithdrawRequestFromSavings(uint25.notice: allows spouse to accept withdrawal request from savings         and sends money to the account that created the request*

changeMarriageStatus().notice: allows spouses to change contract state

deposit(uint256,bytes32).notice: allows spouses or third parties to deposit money in marriage contract

withdraw(uint256,bytes32).notice: allows spouses to withdraw money from the account
